title: News24.com | First Covid-19 case confirmed at 'Sun City' prison in Johannesburg
description: The first Covid-19 case at a prison in Gauteng has been confirmed after an official at Johannesburg Correctional Centre, also known as Sun City, tested positive for the virus.
content:
The first Covid-19 case at a prison in Gauteng has been confirmed after an official at Johannesburg Correctional Centre, also known as Sun City, tested positive for the virus.
In a statement on Tuesday, the Department of Correctional Services announced three… [+1999 chars]
